name: Buster Furrkins-SnappyG6
bio: Ugh! I'm Buster Furrkins-SnappyG6. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. I once dreamed of being a Ventriloquist. Now I can be found talking about how much I lift all day. Our friendship will be tantalizing, despicable, and full of steak.
